page.title: 20A Child's Day in Wilton
page.content: When I woke up my baby sister was crying so I gave her a bottle and got dressed and cleaned my teeth and washed my face. I went back to the bathroom to fetch my sister. I took her nappy off because it was wet. I packed my school bag, brushed my shoes and had my breakfast before Robin, my brother, came down with Mummy and Laura. At school we went to see the Mayor and the previous Mayor for the Domesday Project. Then we went back to school for a playtime before starting to write this. It will be lunch time at 12:00 and we go home at 3:00. I will have time to play before dinner and watch TV. Before I go to sleep I will think what to dream about_ pear trees, maybe, or Spring.
